sentences.en: Block out this unimportant detail at the top of your picture.
sentences.cn: 在底片上把图像上部的这个不重要的细节涂抹掉.

sentences.en: But the issue still struck her as unimportant.
sentences.cn: 不过她觉得这个论题无所谓.

sentences.en: He doesn't deign to talk to unimportant people like me.
sentences.cn: 他不肯屈尊和像我这样不重要的人说话.

sentences.en: I thought that cooking and housekeeping were unimportant, easy tasks.
sentences.cn: 我认为做饭和料理家务微不足道，一下子就能搞定。

sentences.en: In the word " unimportant " , " un - " is a prefix.
sentences.cn: 在单词 unimportant 中un是前缀.

sentences.en: It was an unimportant job, and paid very little.
sentences.cn: 这份工作无足轻重，而且薪水还很低。

sentences.en: Let's not quarrel about such unimportant matters.
sentences.cn: 我们不要为这些小事争吵了.

sentences.en: Money seems unimportant when sets beside the joys of family life.
sentences.cn: 与天伦之乐相比,金钱显得微不足道.

sentences.en: Sometimes this fact is obscured because churches get so bogged down by unimportant rules.
sentences.cn: 有时候教会因为过分拘泥于那些无关紧要的规则而无法看清这一事实。

sentences.en: The matter was so unimportant that she dismissed it from her mind.
sentences.cn: 此事太无足轻重,她将它置之脑后.

sentences.en: The old lady is always fretting over something unimportant.
sentences.cn: 那位老妇人总是为一些小事焦虑不安.

sentences.en: The specific nature of the disturbance is at the moment unimportant.
sentences.cn: 扰动的具体本性在当前并不重要.

sentences.en: We are going to cut out the unimportant details.
sentences.cn: 我们打算把无关紧要的细节删掉.

sentences.en: When they had married, six years before, the difference in their ages had seemed unimportant.
sentences.cn: 他们6年前结婚时，年龄的差距似乎并不重要。
